statements: SELECT * FROM Hotel;
SELECT name, location FROM Hotel;
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_id, room_type, price FROM Room;
SELECT * FROM Booking;
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Booking;
SELECT h.name, h.location, r.room_type, r.price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id;
SELECT h.name, h.location, r.room_type, r.price, b.guest_name, b.check_in_date, b.check_out_date FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id;
SELECT h.name AS hotel_name, r.room_type AS room_type, r.price AS room_price, b.guest_name AS guest_name FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id;
SELECT * FROM Hotel WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Room WHERE price < 200;
SELECT * FROM Booking WHERE total_price > 500;
SELECT h.name, COUNT(r.room_id) AS total_rooms FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT h.name, AVG(r.price) AS average_price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT r.room_type, AVG(r.price) AS average_price FROM Room r GROUP BY r.room_type;
SELECT h.name, COUNT(b.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT h.name, AVG(b.total_price) AS average_booking_price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT h.name, MAX(b.total_price) AS max_booking_price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT h.name, MIN(b.total_price) AS min_booking_price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT h.name, COUNT(b.booking_id) AS total_bookings, SUM(b.total_price) AS total_revenue FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;

SELECT h.name, AVG(b.total_price) AS average_booking_price, MAX(b.total_price) AS max_booking_price, MIN(b.total_price) AS min_booking_price FROM Hotel h JOIN Room r ON h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id JOIN Booking b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY h.name;
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT name, location FROM hotels;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT name, email FROM guests;
SELECT id, name, location, rating FROM hotels;
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM guests;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE id = 5;
SELECT name, email FROM guests WHERE phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM hotels ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM hotels LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM guests LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, email FROM guests WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT id, name FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, rating FROM hotels WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE phone = '555-123-4567';
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT name, location, rating FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_id, name, location, rating FROM hotels;
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT hotel_id, type, price, capacity FROM rooms;
SELECT room_id, price, capacity FROM rooms;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, customer_name FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, customer_name FROM bookings;
SELECT name, price FROM hotels, rooms WHERE hotels.hotel_id = rooms.hotel_id;
SELECT rooms.hotel_id, hotels.name, rooms.type, rooms.price FROM hotels INNER JOIN rooms ON hotels.hotel_id = rooms.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE price < 100;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE type = 'Suite' AND capacity >= 2;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT hotels.name AS hotel_name, rooms.type AS room_type, bookings.check_in_date AS check_in FROM hotels INNER JOIN rooms ON hotels.hotel_id = rooms.hotel_id INNER JOIN bookings ON rooms.room_id = bookings.room_id;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM hotels;
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT name, location FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 4;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM amenities;
SELECT name FROM amenities WHERE name LIKE '%pool%';
SELECT name, location, room_number FROM hotels JOIN rooms ON hotels.hotel_id = rooms.hotel_id;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings JOIN rooms ON bookings.room_id = rooms.room_id;
SELECT name, description FROM amenities JOIN rooms ON amenities.amenity_id = rooms.room_id WHERE rooms.capacity >= 2;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_id = 101;
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM rooms WHERE hotel_id = 101;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM bookings WHERE room_id = 201;
SELECT name FROM amenities WHERE amenity_id = 301;
SELECT hotel_id, name, location FROM hotels WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM rooms WHERE room_id = 501;
SELECT guest_name, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE guest_name = 'Alice';
SELECT name FROM amenities WHERE description LIKE '%WiFi%';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_id IN (101, 102);
